thread.title: Greg Davies gathers his comic friends for charity show
thread.title_full: Greg Davies gathers his comic friends for charity show

title: Greg Davies gathers his comic friends for charity show
text:
Greg Davies gathers his comic friends for charity show Greg Davies gathers his comic friends for charity show Share 
Greg Davies will be joined by a host of funny men – and women – for a fundraising gig. 
The Man Down star will take to the stage alongside Jack Whitehall, Jo Brand, Roisin Conaty, Russell Howard, Dara O Briain and Reginald D Hunter for the Stand Up In Action concert on November 11. Comedy lovers! @gdavies is hosting amazing line-up of comedians @EventimApollo in support of UNHCR & @ActionAidUK ! pic.twitter.com/iGoATd3Vmu 
— UNHCR United Kingdom (@UNHCRUK) October 21, 2015 
The one-off benefit at London’s Eventim Apollo in London’s Hammersmith aims to help raise funds for the refugee crisis, particularly with ActionAid and the UN Refugee Agency (UNHCR) charities. 
Host Greg said: “I’m really excited to be able to introduce such an incredible live bill of comedy in aid of such an important cause. I think it’s already a stellar line-up and there will be other exciting additions in the near future.” Share article 
Pre-sale tickets are available now from See Tickets , before going on sale at Ticketmaster and Eventim Apollo on October 23. Promoted Stories
